title: John Pilger - Reporting the world (2008) [DVDRip.Luft@ISAhub]
description:
Hello,

This is the third DVD box with John Pilger's documentaries and it was just released (although it contains some of Pilger's earliest work).

Contents:
Disc 1-01 World in Action - conversations with a working man (1971)
Disc 1-02 Dismantling a Dream (1977)
Disc 1-03 An Unfashionable Tragedy (1975)
Disc 1-04 A nod and a wink (1975)
Disc 1-05 Smashing Kids (1975)
Disc 1-06 Thalidomide; the ninety-eight we forgot (1974)

Disc 2-01 Vietnam; still America's war (1974)
Disc 2-02 Mr. Nixon's Secret Legacy (1975)
Disc 2-03 The secret country - the first Australians fight back (1985)
Disc 2-04 Zap!! The weapon is food (1976)

Disc 3-01 Nobody's children (1975)
Disc 3-02 The most powerful politician in America (1974)
Disc 3-03 One British Family (1974)
Disc 3-04 Guilty until proven innocent (1974)
Disc 3-05 Heroes (1981)
